p: Basic research, which determines the amount of biologically active components in different mushrooms species allows for the selection of species that have a significant content of β-glucans, thus indicating mushrooms whose cultivation for commercial purposes (food and pharmaceutical industries) can be important. Although there are many reports on the biological activity and structure of β-glucans of fungal origin [ 68, 69, 70], there are few publications on the quantitative evaluation of these compounds in wild mushrooms [ 9, 29].
